about_the_game:
KEBABSTAR: MORE THAN A GAME

Exclusive story of the extraordinary journey of a man who lost everything... Even his camel in the desert. Become a unimaginable hero as you rising from the ashes to become a superhero and social media sensation.

SOCIAL FLAVOR

Join Boran as he navigates through the most ludicrous of circumstances, losing everything, even his camel, in the desert. Yet, with a determination as strong as the spices in his kebabs, he sets out to reclaim his life and become an unexpected social media sensation.

MONEY MAN

Boran discovers the art of kebab-making and rises to become a social media sensation. Prepare to rub elbows with famous businessmen, media moguls, athletes, models, and find yourself selling kebabs in luxurious settings. Are you ready to join Boran on his quest for culinary greatness?

UNUSUAL TACTICS

From concocting dangerous kebabs to implementing devious strategies, players must navigate through a series of challenges where creativity and cunning are key. As they progress, they'll discover the absurdity and hilarity of their actions, making every encounter a memorable adventure in culinary mischief.

EXQUISITE ART

Every scene in "Kebabstar" is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, from the bustling streets of the marketplace to the sizzling grills of the kebab stands. As you explore the vibrant world of Kebabstar, you'll find yourself immersed in an environment that feels truly alive, with characters and environments that look and feel as though they belong in the real world.

STUNNING GRAPHICS

Prepare to be amazed by the breathtaking visual fidelity of Kebabstar. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, the game delivers an major level of realism and fascination that will transport players to a world like no other.

IMMERSIVE ENVIRONMENT

Experience the thrill of stepping into a world where every kebab stand, bustling marketplace, and eccentric character feels remarkably lifelike. The attention to detail and the fidelity of the visuals will transport you to a realm where the line between reality and imagination blurs.

"Kebabstar"
– More than a game...

content_descriptors.notes: There are bikini girls, dances and alcohols in our game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 12.5 Monterey
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: Metal 1.2 compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura 13
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Kebabstar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Exclusive story, a man lost his camel and everything at the desert. You recognized that your camel and all animals in the world is stolen by secret Ice Cream Cult. And the magical blindman is converted you to the superhero. Shoot and your enemies, cook kebabs and become social phenomenon now!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Indonesian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Thai, Swedish, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Greek, Filipino, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Ukrainian, Czech, Azerbaijani, Estonian, Lithuanian, Slovak, Slovenian
*languages with full audio support
